append.pattern:
on click
                            set value to 'Hello there.' then
                            append ' General Kenobi.' to value then
                            set my.innerHTML to value

on click
                            set value to [1,2,3]
                            append 4 to value
                            set my.innerHTML to value as String

on click
                            set result to [1,2,3]
                            append 4
                            put it as String into me

make.pattern: on click make a <span.topping/> then append it to me

fetch.pattern: on click fetch http://localhost:5000/respond?time=2000 then put it after me

on click fetch http://localhost:5000/respond?time=2000 with timeout:100ms
			                    then put it after me

on click
                 add @disabled
                 fetch http://localhost:5000/respond?time=5000
                 put the result after me
               finally
                 remove @disabled

send.pattern: on click send foo(bar:'doh', rey:42) to MySocket

repeat.pattern:
on click
				repeat 2 times
					for x in ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D']
						if (x != 'D') then
							put 'success ' + x  + '. ' at end of me
							continue
							put 'FAIL!!. ' at end of me
						end
				...

on click
				repeat 2 times
					for x in ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D']
						if x is 'C'
						  break
						end
						put x at end of me
					end
				end

on mousedown
	  log 'starting'
      set elapsed to 0
      repeat until event pointerup
		  if elapsed < 100
			wait 1s
			log 'waited'
			set elapsed to elapsed + 10
			continue
		  end
		  log 'bre...

break.pattern:
on click
				repeat 2 times
					for x in ['A', 'B', 'C', 'D']
						if x is 'C'
						  break
						end
						put x at end of me
					end
				end

on open
            breakpoint
            remove .hidden add .overflow-hidden to <body/>
            wait a tick then focus() first <input/> in me
        end
        on close or keyup[key is 'Escape...

throw.pattern:
on click
               put '.' at the end of the next <output/>
               log #throw
               log #throw's checked
               if the #throw's checked is true
                 log 'thro...
on click put MySocket.rpc.throw('Nice...') into my.innerHTML
